It was legit darker an hour before the eclipse peak in Seattle because of the rain 🌧️ 
Oh Seattle 😂 
(Before anyone wants to inform me that we were not in the totality path, honey I know shhh I know.)
Check ☑️ https://t.co/koAgeWCKCH

I have observed a 1:25 correlation with a LinkedIn post and spam messages immediately afterwards.
People wonder why I never post there.
Makes this site seem almost tolerable by comparison, now that I’m shadow-banned here.
That’s truly saying something.

Regarding the XZ backdoor, opensource dependencies, & unpaid maintenance:
#BasicIncome is the most effective way to save us all from this & other unforeseen calamities.
Unpaid labor holds up society, be it caretaking children, elderly, the disabled, or that essential code library

Since being shadow banned on here for what I can only assume was refusing to pay for long tweets and a blue check, it’s been rather peaceful.
I don’t even show up in the timelines of most people who follow me.
I can say absolutely anything.
I’m free as a bird if they were real🐦 https://t.co/hIENa3Mpn5

Since being shadow banned on here for what I can only assume was refusing to pay for long tweets and a blue check, it’s been rather peaceful.
I don’t even show up in the timelines of most people who follow me.
I can say absolutely anything.
I’m free as a bird if they were real🐦 https://t.co/hIENa3Mpn5

Happy #InternationalWomensDay where our notifications go up but our pay does not.
Celebrate us by giving us @PayEquityNow

With equal pay, we can afford to live in places that recognize our body autonomy, health care needs, & reproductive rights.

Our rights begin in our wallets.

Very disappointed that logging into LinkedIn doesn’t get me my choice of breakfast meats. 🥓 

Or eggs. 🍳 

Only spam.

CNAs that don’t assign CVEs to *vulnerabilities only* but instead misuse them as general product bug IDs to non-vulnerabilities should be sanctioned to have their CNA status revoked.
Not even all vulns get assigned CVEs.

https://t.co/IUyet9M2He https://t.co/A0TpmpS9b3

It’s not #LongCovid unless it’s from the variant from that region of France.

Everywhere else, it’s just sparkling mitochondria.

(I have it, & I’m scared I’ll never be the same, so don’t hate me for my Pinot noir humor)

I found this tiny tulip sprouting in my garage. No water, no light, soil bone dry, but it is back to life another year.
Don’t let anyone tell you you’re done, not even yourself.
You have everything you need inside you, ready to grow towards the light.
Here’s to never ending hope. https://t.co/VRJLOMCOLa

Looking forward to presenting 
“The Good, the Bad, & the Bounty: 10 Years of Buying Bugs at Microsoft” with Microsoft CVP @nchlgpt at #RSAC
A decade ago, there were few bounties - learn about the 1st year-round 6 figure bounty launched by the company that once swore never to pay.

15 years ago today, @BarackObama was sworn in.
For many of us here & around the world, it was a moment of joy & hope.
What we didn’t realize was the fear this sparked in some would swing our country backward with such whiplash.
We must hold fast to our hope & win back the fearful https://t.co/80bsbiwcmh
I get so much spam I feel like my inbox is in Guam
I get so much spam I feel like my inbox is in Guam

2024 is (the 1st instance of) my 29th birthday of working in tech.

From bioinformatics working on the human genome project, to systems admin, to Linux developer, to hacker for hire, to security strategist, advisory board member, & tech company founder-

The Internet stayed weird https://t.co/CBxorN5Q2G

"Hack the Planet Gently With a Code of Practice"
Saturday Jan 13 at 10 AM
#shmoocon

Know Your Victim’s Audience (KYVA) is all I’m saying about the @mandiant account hijack

I will post more pics when it arrives.

90% of us are composed of foreign microbes - bacteria, viruses, molds, and fungus that live in & on us.
🔬 
We literally could not live without them, our holobiome maintaining balance is what brings us health & longevity.
⚕️
May you all collectively live long and prosper.🖖🏼🦠

Sign Your Name to Europa Clipper's Message in a Bottle -> Earth’s first mission to conduct detailed reconnaissance of Jupiter’s moon, Europa. NASA’s Europa Clipper will determine if this ocean world has environments suitable for life to exist. https://t.co/VFbH8CaRHt

Who wants another boring old recap or prediction roundup at the end of the year?

What’s a weird random fact not many people know about you, specifically useless as a security question.

I’ll start -

Dane Cook has my electric guitar 🎸

It’s ok to hire certain hackers with criminal backgrounds.
It’s not ok to hire antisocial violent people, regardless of whether they’ve ever committed, been charged, or been convicted of a crime.
The willingness of people to overlook sociopathy on this website is not a surprise.

Rest in peace
Scapy The Cat 🐈‍⬛ 
2005 - 2023

May he sit in the middle of every jigsaw puzzle & furniture building project in the sunshine, always.

He was a faithful companion & fellow hacker who will be forever missed. https://t.co/nxOrjl4xhN

Do we want another jd1?

Because that’s how you get jd1s

Give attention to real people doing great things https://t.co/neKHv6SMT0

Gonna make a virtual conference with AI generated men giving talks with references to their original real female creators and pay out sponsorship money to those women.

Community notes have a language setting and mine is correctly set to only English.

But sure, yes, this ragtag bunch of volunteers & the system running it totally replaces the Trust and Safety team

This is an example of a security bulletin that does not comply with the ISO standard for vulnerability disclosure, since there’s no actionable information, & also could distract security teams on a holiday.
It takes a lot to be worse than non-disclosure. https://t.co/2IHy97vLnl

Don’t ever let anyone Jedi mind trick you out of the fact that the “Disclosure” in “Vulnerability Disclosure” stands for Disclosure to parties at risk so they can protect themselves, NOT disclosure to a vendor so they can sit on it & call you irresponsible if you warn the public.
New from Jeffrey Burt for ⁦@securityblvd⁩  on the 10 year anniversary of the Microsoft #bugbounty program https://t.co/0kisVr2pJf

People following me for years don’t see my posts unless they specifically visit my page.
The guy who bought this place said legacy blue checks who don’t pay would be buried.
Hence my last tweet with a blog about internet history won’t be seen unless it’s retweeted.
Shame, really.

So the clown car crash that is OpenAI is still doing that slow mo careening the public can’t look away from & I just want to take a moment to point out how ridiculously dramatic the mess is, for so called leaders to fumble all this so spectacularly.
Yet they still fail/flail up.

Absolutely zero men who are fired from high profile jobs are ever in any danger of failing.
That’s just not how the world works.
Companies can go bankrupt, investors lose billions, but these dudes just bounce higher.
Whereas women in similar situations become like nuclear waste.

I have never been to Maui I swear https://t.co/EJGjZhmjux

“The men and women of Guam are U.S. citizens who serve in the military at a rate that is three times higher than the rest of the country. Yet in 2012 Guam ranked last in per capita medical spending by the Veteran's Affairs.”
#VeteransDay https://t.co/dX7mPqeQDy

The seasons just speed up is what they don’t tell you until all you can see is a blur.
I hope you all still get those slow, dancing, glittering moments from time to time.
I am grateful each time I do, now that I’m aware of their scarcity.

1 reason Clubhouse got so popular was because we were still in various forms of lockdown & lonely.
Then it became simultaneously replaced with its own commercialism & Twitter’s ability to add voice so quickly.
If it had stayed more intimate, it might have won.
We’re still lonely.

Huh.
That’s remarkable to me for some reason.

Get out there and try some delicious Indian food, Americans!

- security through obscurity doesn’t work

- silencing researchers w C&Ds backfires

So simple to understand & explain that nobody likes to hear it when they don’t understand the crux of it & are oversimplifying it to the point of explaining it incorrectly

Even my own family only get group updates about how my #LongCovid is going.
Why tf do some ppl think sliding into my DMs to ask for a personalized update just for them is helping me at all?
I’m exhausted. 
Get a grip parasocial concerns trolls.
I don’t owe you an update.

Follow my lead, never theirs.
I shine just fine on my own.

I explained it’s for a National Science Foundation-funded study I’m a principle investigator on & they told me they are proud of me.
I’m just going to live on that forever.

Want to know a reason long Covid exhausts people?
If I left my fitness tracker on ALL DAY before, the most it would show me burning was 900-1100 calories.
Now that my heart races often, this is just less than 3 hours.
It isn’t a good way to burn calories.
It’s a way to burn out🔥 https://t.co/llgakHzgOk

Me: My hair glows in blacklight, here let me show you (digs in purse)

My team: Why do you carry a blacklight on your keychain? Is it to gross yourself out in hotel rooms??

Me: No originally it’s because I autographed Joe Menn’s cDc book in UV ink.

Now it’s to find scorpions.🦂

Dailydave today was a banger.

“a million smaller start-ups with tiny cubicles in the booth-space, like pebbles on a beach. Hunting through them is like searching for shells - for every Thinkst Canary there's a hundred newly AI-enabled compliance engines.”

I’m glad I didn’t go to catch another variant of Covid in Vegas at Blackhat Defcon etc.

I also would not have been able to participate at all given my current long Covid symptoms.

My heart still races from standing up for too long.

I hope everyone recovers faster than I am. 🫀

If the “door knock to fight” actually happens, it will have been fully staged from both sides.

We gotta give these kids a fighting chance.

I’m sorry for us all that the majority of people no longer take ANY Covid precautions.
1 in 10 chances of being permanently disabled via airborne contagion should be treated like the international health crisis it is.
It isn’t even “Good for the economy”.
It’s just myopic madness

This is the 1st wave of Covid we’re experiencing without any public health measures.
Vaccines can’t save you from infection with current variants, treatments are becoming less effective, & long Covid is a 1 in 10 loaded weapon.
The security community is failing at risk management

🍿

I’m sick of men who want to be recognized for allyship “even when it’s not perfect”

Men: listen, step up, step back & learn when corrected

Y’all don’t need a medal🎖️

I’m breaking my own Do Not Even Subtweet rule by saying this.
Block, shun, no need to weigh in to tell him what an ass he is or prove him wrong.

He’s playing all of you.

The way to win tug of war with a troll is to drop the rope.

#Defcon advice:

- Bring Covid tests.
- Wear a mask 😷 
- Throat swab before nasal swab test each morning before entering the conference.
- Isolate & notify contacts if you test positive.

Don’t minimize the dangers of a disease that still kills & debilitates at random.

Be safe

Don’t capitalists realize that by destroying the planet, failing to address inequity, mass starvation, displacement, famine, the migrant crisis, while union-busting — don’t they see that nobody will be left to eke out a meager living in their industries or consume their goods?

I’m hoping all my friends enjoy a safe,  educational, delightful, magical #DEFCON & that those going to #BlackHat see all the great talks & none of the boring ones.
I hope my enemies do some self-reflection & if not, I hope they get caught being themselves by as many as possible.

LADIES!
Just wanted to remind you of who you are:

You’re strong even when you are feeling weak.
You’re brave especially when you are afraid.
You’re capable even when you make mistakes.
You’re worthy even when others reject you.

Look at how far you’ve come & how far you’ll go ✨

Misogynists have no idea they aren’t the hero in our stories.

They are sometimes bosses to defeat but mostly are just NPCs stuck in an endless loop of ignorance, playing a one-dimensional role in OUR heroine’s quest.

“Ice cream so good 😋
women aren’t as good as we are *SLURP*”

Some Work Stuff & a 2nd Thing
Or
